7318624417215.name: Rookie Warrior
7318624417215.summary: Heavy armor set for a rookie warrior, for CBBE 3BA, BHUNP, and HIMBO
7318624417215.description:
There are seven modular pieces: the chestplate, the gambeson, pants, poleyns, boots, bracers, and gloves.

For the gambeson and the pants, there are six color variants that you can mix and match. I think black and red looks pretty good.

For 3BA and BHUNP, the gambeson has two versions, one with physics enables and one which does not, the non physics one is for wearing with the chestplate, or if you just enjoy no physics. The boots also come in high heels or regular boots for women.

The chestplate does not jiggle, this is by design.

Requirements:

CBBE 3BA or BHUNPv4 or HIMBO

Bodyslide

Racemenu

esl flagged esp. Use additemmenu, or craft and also temper with steel smithing perk because I found an xedit script that does this for me.

Build with bodyslide first.

7318624419296.name: Sprites
7318624419296.summary: Sprites set for 3BA and BHUNPv4; Elemental sprite/faerie wear in 4 colors.
7318624419296.description:
No, not the lemon-lime soda.

Pieces:

- Bra

- Panty

- Necklace

- Sleeves

- Crown

 - Anklets

- Earrings

- Thighband

All the little silver leaf pieces move with SMP, it was quite a lot of work so I can only hope it's worth it.

esl flagged esp. Use [additemmenu](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17563), [modex](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/137877), or [console](https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)); no crafting recipes. [Build with bodyslide ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45E8qqnqJDQ)first.

Requirements:

CBBE 3BA or BHUNPv4

Bodyslide

FSMP﻿

Racemenu

Screenshots:

[myst](https://x.com/Myst314)﻿

[url=https://x.com/NuuweiNoir]nuuwei

[/url][thewheel](https://x.com/Thewheel_Skyrim)

  ![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

7318624419534.name: Forbidden Ebony Armor
7318624419534.summary: Ebony armor set for 3BA, BHUNPv4, and HIMBO
7318624419534.description:
A set of heavy armor, 10 pieces. Bodysuit in rubber or leather, heels or boots, vambraces, rerebraces, pauldrons, leggings, belt, gloves

It was originally a mashup for Oldrim 7B by Stevierage [here](https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/377-sevenbase-conversions-bombshell-and-cleavage-bbp/), I converted it to CBBE 3BA, BHUNP and HIMBO for SSE and replaced the base textures with xavbio's ebony textures, and separated out each piece.

esl flagged esp. Use [additemmenu](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17563), [modex](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/137877), or [console](https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)); crafting recipes require ebony smithing. [Build with bodyslide ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45E8qqnqJDQ)first.

Requirements:

One of the body mods

Bodyslide

Racemenu

Screenshots:

[sneedster](https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/eternalreminder)

[thewheel](https://x.com/Thewheel_Skyrim)

![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

7318624420449.name: Arianne Follower
7318624420449.description:
It's my 100th mod!

Thanks to [namtar55](https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/namtar55), who really did all of the hard work here, I can share the character I take screenshots with as a follower.

You can find her at the Winking Skeever.

She is a mage. The esp is esl flagged.

CBBE 3BA Bodyslide presets are included, and there is a custom body shape path; there are prebuilt meshes, but you can build the shapes with your own presets, or use something like OBody.

Outfits in screenshots:

[Black Rose](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/142926)

[Crochet Bikini](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/146397)

[Tribal Clothes](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/120203)

[Floral Dress](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/144834)﻿

[Towels](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/145113)

[Invicta Couture Lingerie](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/145126)

7318624418781.name: Crochet Bikini
7318624418781.summary: Crochet Bikini in 18 colors for CBBE 3BA and BHUNP
7318624418781.description:
Two pieces, top and bottom, there's 18 colors.

It sounds like a terrible idea to make a bikini out of yarn, it would feel really disgusting if it ever touches water for a split second.

7318624417497.name: Towels
7318624417497.summary: Comfy and soft, 100% Hammerfell cotton towels in 9 colors for CBBE 3BA, BHUNP, HIMBO, and UBE.
7318624417497.description:
Hat towel, shoulder towel, body towel, waist towel.

The shoulder and waist towels have SMP cloth physics.

If the cloth physics doesn't behave well, try increasing the simulation quality in the FSMP configs, if it tanks your fps, buy a 5090. SMP is very finicky with frame rate and sampling rate affecting the simulation outcome. Your mileage may vary, but it works on my setup.

Requirements:

One of the aforementioned body mods

[Bodyslide](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/201)

[Latest FSMP version﻿](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/57339)

esl flagged esp. Use [additemmenu](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17563), [modex](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/137877), or [console](https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)); or you can craft this with 2 tundra cotton and temper with 1. [Build with bodyslide ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45E8qqnqJDQ)first.

stilted

7318624417218.name: Floral Dress
7318624417218.summary: Floral dress and heels with SMP in 8 patterns for CBBE 3BA, BHUNPv4, and HIMBO
7318624417218.description:
A floral dress, I saw this on the daz store and thought it looked just beautiful, so here it is ported to SSE.

If the cloth physics doesn't behave well, try increasing the simulation quality in the FSMP configs, if it tanks your fps, buy a 5090. SMP is very finicky with frame rate and sampling rate affecting the simulation outcome. Your mileage may vary, but it works on my setup.

Requirements:

One of the aforementioned body mods

[Bodyslide](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/201)

[Latest FSMP version﻿](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/57339)

Racemenu

esl flagged esp. Use [additemmenu](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17563), [modex](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/137877), or [console](https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)); [Build with bodyslide ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45E8qqnqJDQ)first.

  ![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

7318624415310.name: Black Rose
7318624415310.summary: n8k's somewhat unreasonably revealing clothing set. Refreshed for 3BA, BHUNPv4, and HIMBO
7318624415310.description:
My reworked version of the Black Rose set originally by n8k for Oldrim. Previous conversions to SSE have all just coped with the issues with the meshes, which I have tried to address here. Let's say this is Black Rose Refreshed? This is a direct conversion from the [original UNPB mod page ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46580)from n8k.

Pieces separated out for mix and match enthuiasts. 

The original meshes were fried in terms of polygons and normals (the heels normals were inside out for some reason), so I did some blender work to fix it up and subdivide the pieces so they have more than 20 polygons each, and a lot of small manual mesh edits. They should be less blocky now and generally have less jarring angular shapes. This is not perfect, of course, but it should at least go from 2013 to maybe 2018.

SMP physics has been added to the dangly bits like the rings and the belt ends. On the textures side, the lace textures have been improved, and there are also two new recolors in the usual colors of roses - red and white.

There are hand painted weights for immersive physics, with special thanks to [PsychoWedge](https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/PsychoWedge) for doing the BHUNP weight painting. 

Also, some custom sliders that I will leave as an exercise for the reader to find out what they do.

﻿![Image](https://i.imgur.com/gLNfhTJ.png)﻿

These things all have SMP now, yay!

esl flagged esp. Use [additemmenu](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17563), [modex](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/137877), or [console](https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)); no crafting recipes. [Build with bodyslide ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45E8qqnqJDQ)first.

Requirements:

CBBE 3BA or BHUNPv4

Bodyslide

FSMP﻿

Racemenu

Optionally, if you have heels sounds and [sound records distributor](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/77815), the heels will have heel footstep sounds.

Screenshots:

[myst](https://x.com/Myst314)﻿

[nuuwei](https://x.com/NuuweiNoir)

[thewheel](https://x.com/Thewheel_Skyrim)﻿

[xkopterx](https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/xtrareelz)

 ![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

![Image](https://files.catbox.moe/cvf8jb.gif)

[one more thing](https://imgur.com/R8QEfSL)

7318624395023.name: Simple Nail Polish - Brighter Colors Patch
7318624395023.summary: Patch for Simple Nail Polish by CallMeMoon to add white and brighter colored nail polish overlay options
7318624395023.description:
This is just a simple texture and script change to add white and brighter colored nail polish options to the [Simple Nail Polish ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/108077)mod.

The original textures are too dark for lighter and brighter colored Racemenu hues, since the hues act as a tint layer over the texture, so I adjusted the textures to be lighter and saved them to separate files. The script has also been adjusted so now there are light and dark options for each overlay. 

Requires the original mod and all of its requirements.

7318624417128.name: Tris Heels
7318624417128.summary: Heels and socks in 8 colors and a variety of textures for CBBE 3BA, BHUNP, and UBE
7318624417128.description:
more heels here ? 

The heels and the socks can be equipped separately, but the socks are heel shaped, so it's really that you can optionally wear socks with your heels. The other way around doesn't work.

Requires Racemenu for NiOverride high heels, and bodyslide to build the mesh.

If you have [sound record distributor ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/77815)and heels sounds, this will have heels sounds.

7318624416776.name: Vampire Temptress Armor BHUNP
7318624416776.summary: BHUNP bodyslides for Enovilum's Vampire Temptress Armor set
7318624416776.description:
What is a man? [b]A miserable little pile of secrets[/b].

Requires the [original mod ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/138179)for textures and esp, some common sense here and there, and SMP.

Thanks to the amazing work of [PsychoWedge](https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/PsychoWedge) there's also options for immersive physics for several pieces - metal plates won't jiggle, and so on.

Step by step guide:

* Download SMP if you haven't

* Download the bodyslide files here

heels here ?

7318624416654.name: Sugar Attack
7318624416654.summary: A shield and mace with five color variants for the high fructose corn syrup pilled adventurer
7318624416654.description:
Sugar spice and everything nice. I guess spice might be pushing it, Kellogg wanted the flakes to be absolutely as bland as possible.

The cereal box just has one texture, but the lollipops come in five flavors. 

How many smacks does it take to get to the center of a tootsie pop? Infinite, because Skyrim does not have durability.

Cereal box is craftable and temperable with steel smithing at a forge with 3 wheat and 5 firewood. Similarly at the forge, you can craft the lollipops with 4 moon sugar and 1 firewood, and temper at a sharpening wheel with 1 additional moon sugar.

* Download SMP if you haven't

7318624416245.summary: DEM Open Dress for CBBE 3BA, BHUNPv4, and HIMBO with SMP

Krista originally made or ported this to Oldrim. I converted it for SSE 3BA, BHUNP and HIMBO with texture upscaling to 4K. I additionally added a retexture from [NIND](https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/12628-dem-open-dress-cbbe-hdt-cloth/)﻿ and rigged/weighted the skirt and ropes for SMP. There are also half a dozen custom sliders that do various things.

7318624415049.name: Ebokini
7318624415049.summary: Ebokini set by gutris1 reworked for vanilla, 3BA, BHUNPv4, and HIMBO
7318624415049.description:
Ebony bikini. My version of the Ebokini set originally by gutris1.

![Image](https://i.imgur.com/07qRrzY.png)

Specific changes:

Pieces separated out so they can be equipped and unequipped separately, and a variety of zap sliders and adjustment sliders. Added SMP to the earrings, and the two scarf pieces also have SMP rigged to separate bones and can move independently of each other, look at the screenshots for some cool examples.

This is a direct conversion from Oldrim based on the [original gutris1 mod page](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77070). There are no new pieces this time because the original permissions precluded any mashups. The crossbow is not included here either because the permissions says I can't.

This version uses custom ebony textures from xavbio instead of the vanilla textures. There's also two recolor texture variants available as optional downloads.

esl flagged esp. Use additemmenu, or there are crafting recipes that require ebony smithing. Build with bodyslide first.

Requirements:

CBBE 3BA or BHUNPv4

Bodyslide

FSMP﻿

Racemenu

![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

Please do not rehost this directly on baidu and post it on 9dm. You are free to link to this page, but the original usage permissions precludes reuploads outside of Nexus.

7318624415375.name: Ancient imperial armor but there is SMP now
7318624415375.summary: Adds SMP cloth physics for 4thUnknown's ancient imperial armor
7318624415375.description:
I started putting this together before I realized this is a pain in the ass. The close vicinity of the metal plate on the right thigh makes me want to cry. Also the fact that there are two separate pieces that are supposed to move independently of each other in the front and back and they are so close together.

This adds SMP to the chainmail skirt, the three leather flaps in the front and back, the two dangly cloth pieces on the chest, and the hanging bit of leather on the back of the armor.

This mostly works but there's a lot of subtle clipping just because all the meshes are so close together, it's practically impossible to fix all of it.

Someone else can feel free to carry on the torch and make it better if they want?

These are bodyslide files using [urbon's conversion ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/142700)as the base for HIMBO and BHUNP; [pentapox ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/142702)for 3BA. Get the rest of the bodyslide files for gloves and boots there if you'd like.

Requires the original mod, bodyslide, and some modding acumen like knowing how to install FSMP and everything related to it. This just provides the bodyslide files, rigged and weighted meshes, and the xml.

7318624414675.name: Elvenia Armor
7318624414675.summary: Elvenia armor set originally by gutris1 reworked for 3BA and BHUNPv4 with custom textures and new pieces
7318624414675.description:
My version of the Elvenia armor set originally by [gutris1](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80615). Shall we call this Elvenia 2025?

Specific changes:

Pieces separated out so they can be equipped and unequipped separately, some new pieces created from the same assets, added SMP to the belly tassels thing, and a variety of zap sliders and adjustment sliders. The pieces that you'd expect to have physics all have SMP physics now, yay!

This is partially based on kahvipannu84's 3BA version with squeeze sliders and weights, so this inherits all of the changes made there along with the original SE Kalessin42 3BA version that it's based on. Here I made some more uv, weights, and slider changes of my own, made some new pieces with the assets, and also brought those features to BHUNP because the cult of BHUNP graciously tests and takes screenshots for me.

This version also uses custom textures from xavbio instead of the vanilla elven armor textures. See credits.

This version is standalone thanks to the permissions of the previous iterations of this outfit. 

esl flagged esp. Use additemmenu, or there are actually crafting recipes this time as well that requires elven smithing. Build with bodyslide first.

[size=2][b]Requirements:[/b]

CBBE 3BA or BHUNPv4

Bodyslide

FSMP﻿

Racemenu[/size]

![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

7318624414407.name: Martha Wayne Outfit
7318624414407.summary: Martha Wayne's outfit from Batman Arkham Knight converted for CBBE 3BA and BHUNP
7318624414407.description:
I was asked by [Nuascura ](https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/Nuascura)last year to take over [this old outfit](https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/5387-martha-wayne-outfit-sultry-shawls-rev). I said I will do it later - a wizard is never late or early, so I totally did not just forget about this until a couple months later. I am not the hero SSE deserves or needs, I just convert obscure old outfits badly.

Aside from modernizing the bodyslide files to 3BA and BHUNP v4 alongside other stuff like converting to form 44, NiOverride heels instead of HDT, I also gave it some touch ups like using texturesets to save on mesh space, and added a couple of retexture colors. There are four colors for the dress, three for the fur jacket, two for the heels. 

If you have sound record distributor and heels sounds, the heels will have heels sounds.

esl flagged esp. Use additemmenu. Build with bodyslide first. No crafting recipes.

7318624414377.name: Aether
7318624414377.summary: DEM Aether outfit remade for CBBE 3BA and BHUNP
7318624414377.description:
![Image](https://i.imgur.com/duK5fXe.png)

Metal and cloth and gems. For mages or something, idk

This is a rework of Krista's DEM Aether outfit from Skyrim LE with texture upscaling, new colors, and various adjustments and new pieces I made.

Outfit includes separate pieces for: bracelet, armlet, choker, chest, waist belt, top belt, panty, thigh ring, earrings, anklet. 

4k/2k textures, options are the combinatorical results of silver/gold metal, red/blue gem, black/white cloth.

esl flagged esp. Use additemmenu. Build with bodyslide first. No crafting recipes.

Also needs FSMP for SMP pieces to work.

![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

</details>

7318624414228.name: The Last Vampire Hunter CBBE 3BA
7318624414228.summary: CBBE 3BA bodyslide conversions for hyruledm's the last vampire hunter with my opinionated changes
7318624414228.description:
A port of a port! 

Some additional changes I made to my own taste:

SMP parameter adjustments. I made the cloth weightier, so they are flappier than the original. 

I also separated out the sash/tie thing into its own mesh and gave it SMP bones.

I did [s]not[/s] convert the chest belt piece, because weight painting and manually adjusting all the sliders was driving me crazy - someone please do this? [i]I did this, it was a pain in the ass. It doesn't work very well but you get what you get[/i]

Requires the original [mod ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/141426)for textures and esp. You will also need SMP.

Step by step guide:

[list=1]

* Download the original BHUNP mod for assets and esp

* Download SMP if you haven't

* Download the bodyslide files here

* Build bodyslide files

* yay! you did it

![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

- minor smp changes, I sucked it up and did the chest belt
</details>

7318624403844.name: See La Mer
7318624403844.summary: Beach and ocean themed See La Mer outfit set converted from Oldrim UNPB to CBBE 3BA and BHUNP with SMP.
7318624403844.description:
I found this set in an Oldrim armor compilations pack for CBBE. Based on what I could find I believe this was first attributed to Melodic for Oldrim UNPB and 7B. I updated it for SSE 3BA and BHUNP with some of my own changes.

Added SMP to the cloth pieces, and repainted the bra shell pieces bone weights to be rigid with more realistic physic behavior. Also added gold and purple recolors.

esl flagged esp. Use additemmenu and build with bodyslide. Needs FSMP for SMP pieces to work.

No need to tell me about missing textures in bodyslide, they will show up in game correctly, just trust.

![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

releases.changelog:
<details>
<summary>Click to view Changelog for v1.1</summary>

- actually mark the esp as esl
</details>

7318624402058.name: Dragon Song
7318624402058.summary: Egyptian themed outfit converted from Oblivion with additional pieces created for CBBE 3BA, BHUNP and UBE
7318624402058.description:
I don't know why this set is called dragon song, it seems to be Egyptian themed and there are no dragons there. From what I can find it seems like it was originally made for Oblivion by [b][GSBmodders](https://www.loverslab.com/profile/190-gsbmodders/)[/b]         

Outfit includes separate pieces for: forearm, upper arm, necklace, chest, waist ring, belly piercing, panty, thigh, calves, feet. 

I added new waist ring, thigh and feet pieces that I made using the assets, and also added SMP to the necklace, chest chain, belly piercing, and the ankh on the panty. Also added red and blue recolors and upscaled the textures.

esl flagged esp. Use additemmenu. Default zeroed sliders meshes and .tri files are prebuilt and packed in the bsa this time for 3BA and UBE. 

Also needs FSMP for SMP pieces to work.

![Image](https://i.imgur.com/NAEELTf.png)

- Decreased polygon count of collision mesh, should help with SMP dropping fps
</details>

7318624401789.name: Lady Mask
7318624401789.summary: Adds 11 masks and veils with SMP physics and bodyslide options
7318624401789.description:
This is an old Oblivion mod.

I upscaled the textures to 2K/4K, added some recolor options for the veil, added bodyslide zap and adjustment sliders, and added SMP to the veil.

There's 11 mask varieties, and each comes with 4 options for veils. Bodyslide includes zaps for mask and veil, and also some basic movement sliders in case it doesn't fit on your character's face very well.

You need FSMP for the veil physics to work.

esl flagged esp. No prebuilt meshes, build with bodyslide and use additemmenu. No crafting recipes. This uses slot 44.

<details>
<summary>Click to view Changelog for v1.2</summary>

- Fixed the zaps
</details>

<details>
<summary>Click to view Changelog for v1.1</summary>

- Added standalone veils, bsa packed
</details>

7318624401549.name: Tea Maid Outfit
7318624401549.summary: Maid outfit with Chinese characteristics for CBBE 3BA with SMP skirt and apron. 4 colors and 8 outfit pieces.
7318624401549.description:
Outfit pieces are headband, dress, apron, bracelet, socks, stockings, loafers, and heels.

Four colors, red/black, white/blue, white/black, and red/gold. Each colorway has a couple of patterns. Loafers, socks and heels come in 7 colors. Stockings in 2 colors. Default textures are 4k/2k with full 4k available in optional downloads.

esl flagged esp. No prebuilt meshes, build with bodyslide and use additemmenu. No crafting recipes.

You will need Racemenu for NiOverride heels and FSMP for the dress.

If you have both heels sound and [sound record distributor ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/77815)installed, the heels will have heel sounds.

7318624401400.name: Delilah Dress
7318624401400.description:
This was previously ported to 7B body by [Army](https://x.com/Army_Skyrim/status/1286059475732967430) which is how I found this. I went to find the original assets, converted it to CBBE 3BA, added a couple of colors from there, and also added SMP for the dress. It was a lot of work to rig and paint the weights for this, and it's still a little wonky but I guess it is just how it is.

esl flagged esp. No prebuilt meshes, build with bodyslide and use additemmenu. No crafting recipes.

Requirements:

CBBE 3BA

Bodyslide

FSMP﻿

Racemenu

Common sense

![Image](https://files.catbox.moe/exzqmr.gif)

7318624401223.name: Hkx Conversion Tool
7318624401223.summary: Windows GUI program for converting hkx files between Skyrim SE/LE formats and XML for modding
7318624401223.description:
[size=6]HKX Conversion Tool[/size]

HKX Conversion Tool is a GUI wrapper for [serde-hkx ](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/126214)for converting Havok files between different formats for Skyrim modding.

I initially started building a wrapper for [hkxcmd](https://github.com/figment/hkxcmd), but since that doesn't handle amd64 hkx files, I was also using [hkxconv ](https://github.com/ret2end/hkxconv)to convert those into xmls first and pushing those xmls through hkxcmd, and then I got upset that the solution was messy and started to look at their source code to try and build a modern version that handles win32, amd64 and xml format conversions between each other. Thankfully I didn't get too far into reinventing the wheel before I found out someone built this already, so I just repurposed the GUI tool for their CLI since It Just Works™.

Working with havok files is really a pain in the ass, since Blender's hkx plugin can't import Skyrim SE/amd64 hkx formats, they have to all be converted to win32 Oldrim format first. A lot of the existing guides will tell you to find and install Havok Content Tools and use hctStandAloneFilterManager.exe. It annoyed me a lot that the animation modding toolchain basically relies on an obsolete and unsupported tool that you have to find a download for on some google drive folder.

Maybe someone will also reimplement hkanno to not rely on HCT and just work off of xml for annotations editing, then animating and animation modding in 2024 wouldn't be excruciatingly tedious for anyone that has to work with existing animations.

[size=5]Features[/size]

* Convert HKX files to XML format and between formats for Skyrim LE and SE

* Convert XML files to HKX format for Skyrim LE and SE

* Batch conversion support

* User-friendlier GUI interface

* Specify output folder and suffix options

[size=5]Installation[/size]

[list=1]

* Download the latest release.

* Extract the zip file to your desired location.

* Run [font=Courier New]hkxtools.exe[/font] file.

[size=5]Usage[/size]

[list=1]

* Launch the application.

* Click "Browse Input Files" to select the HKX or XML files you want to convert.

* (Optional) Set the output folder by clicking "Browse" next to "Output Folder".

* (Optional) Enter a suffix for the output files.

* Select the desired output format (XML, Skyrim LE, or Skyrim SE).

* Click "Run Conversion" to start the conversion process.

[size=5]License[/size]

This project is licensed under the MIT License - see below for details:

[/size][[size=3]here[/size]](https://github.com/gs-oar/hkxtools)[size=5]

[/size]
